Sentece: The results demonstrated a sevenfold increase in sensitivity (reducing the ED50 from 24 micrograms/kg to 3.5 micrograms/kg) to vecuronium when it was administered following recovery from decamethonium block, and a partial reversal lf the vecuronium block by decamethonium when the decamethonium was administered during recovery from vecuronium block.
Title: Potentiation and antagonism of vecuronium by decamethonium.
Name: Decamethonium
